Key Match Events: Anthony Edwards was held to 15 points on 5-16 shooting by the Celtics' defense.
Jrue Holiday effectively guarded Anthony Edwards, holding him to 2-9 from the 3-point line.
Post-Match Reflections: Anthony Edwards expressed frustration with the Celtics' defense, stating it was difficult to beat two NBA players.
Edwards acknowledged that he had to pass the ball more than he wanted due to the Celtics' defensive tactics.
